  • ramploss
  • View page source

ramploss¶

this example optimizes a linear classifier using the non-convex ramploss instead of any convex loss function.

this example requires the liac-arff package to read ARFF file

Author:
Yu-Ren Liu, Yang Yu
class ramploss.RampLoss(arfffile)[source]¶

Define ramploss learning loss function.

__init__(arfffile)[source]¶
calc_h(ylfx, st)[source]¶

Calculate hinge loss.

calc_product(weight, j)[source]¶

Calculate product between the weights and the instance.

Parameters:
  • weight – weight vector
  • j – the index of the instance
Returns:

product value
calc_regularization(weight)[source]¶

Calculate regularization

dim()[source]¶

Construct dimension of this problem.

eval(solution)[source]¶

Objectve function to calculate the ramploss.

read_data(filename)[source]¶

Read data from file.

Parameters:filename – Name of the file to read
Returns:no return
training_error(best)[source]¶

Training error.

trans_label(i)[source]¶

Transform label from 0/1 to -1/+1
